summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Governance module (Trust Meeting Minutes). All backend APIs working perfectly, frontend UI fully functional with authentication resolved. Successfully tested meeting creation, editing, finalization workflow, and hash integrity.

minor_fixes_applied.issue: React error - passing JSX element instead of component to PageHeader icon prop
minor_fixes_applied.fix_applied: Changed icon={<Gavel className="w-8 h-8" />} to icon={Gavel}

passed_tests: Backend - Governance meeting retrieval with portfolio filter (GET /api/governance/meetings)
Backend - Meeting finalization with SHA-256 hash (POST /api/governance/meetings/{id}/finalize)
Frontend - Governance page loads correctly with authentication
Frontend - Meeting list display with proper status badges
Frontend - New Meeting button and dialog
Frontend - Meeting editor page loads correctly
Frontend - Meeting details display (title, RM-ID, status, attendees)
Frontend - Agenda items section with add functionality
Frontend - Edit button for draft meetings
